fields.footerNote: Please make sure the bucket exists in your GCS
fields.label: GCS Storage Bucket Name
fields.labelNote: GCS Bucket to store your event data
fields.regexErrorMessage: Invalid Staging GCS Object Storage Bucket Name

fields.label: Prefix
fields.labelNote: If configured, all data pushed by rudderstack will be at https://storage.googleapis.com/<bucketName>/<prefix>/

fields.footerNote: All data for the destination would be pushed to https://storage.googleapis.com/<bucketName>/<prefix>/rudder-datalake/<namespace>.
fields.label: Namespace
fields.labelNote: Schema name for the warehouse where the tables are created

fields.footerNote: Create a service account in your GCP Project for RudderStack with roles of 'storage.objectCreator'
fields.label: Credentials
fields.labelNote: GCP Service Account credentials JSON for RudderStack to use in loading data into your Google Cloud Storage

fields.footerNote: Note: Please specify time in UTC
fields.label: Sync Starting At (Optional)
